top_positive.title: First week 'critical' to avoid children missing school later, parents told
top_positive.summary_llm: Education Secretary Bridget Phillipson said schools and parents should "double down" to get children in at the start of the 2025 term . More than half (57%) of pupils who were partially absent in week one became "persistently absent" Overall, 18% of pupils were persistently absent in the 2024-25 school year, down from 23% in 2021-22 .

top_positive.title: The trade in US body parts that's completely legal - but ripe for exploitation
top_positive.summary_llm: For-profit body trade is effectively outlawed in the UK and other European countries . But looser regulation in the US has allowed the trade to flourish in the U.S. The largest investigation of its kind - conducted by Reuters journalist Brian Grow - has identified 25 for 25 forking companies in the trade .

top_positive.title: Tories pledge to get all oil and gas out of North Sea
top_positive.summary_llm: Tories pledge to get all oil and gas out of North Sea if elected . Kemi Badenoch to formally announce plan to focus solely on "maximising extraction" Reform UK has said it wants more fossil fuels extracted from the North Sea . Labour government has committed to banning new exploration licences .

top_positive.summary_llm: Thousands of pro-Palestine protesters gathered in the Italian city to demonstrate against the war in Gaza . Helicopter was attempting to collect water to fight wildfires at the time of the crash . At least three people have also died in Spain, Albania and Turkey as wildfires wreak havoc .

top_positive.title: ‘Public enemy number one’: The battle against an eight-toothed beetle threatening UK forests
top_positive.summary_llm: The bark beetle has been the scourge of Europe, killing millions of spruce trees . UK government scientists have been fighting back with sniffer dogs, drones and nuclear waste models . They claim the UK has eradicated the beetle from at risk areas in the east and south east . But climate change could make the job even harder in the future .

top_negative.title: 'Better than I thought' - Moyes lauds maverick Grealish after win at Wolves
top_negative.summary_llm: Jack Grealish has gone from forgotten man to main man in double-quick time since joining Everton on loan . He has been left out of England squad for World Cup qualifiers against Andorra and Serbia . The former Manchester City man is the first Everton player to assist two or more goals in consecutive Premier League appearances for the Toffees . David Moyes: "He is even better

top_negative.title: Elliott sees opportunities to create value at warehouse REIT Rexford Industrial
top_negative.summary_llm: Elliott sees opportunities to create value at warehouse REIT Rexford Industrial . The industrial REIT space has benefited from strong secular tailwinds, as the rise of e-commerce has driven up warehousing needs over time . Despite being a California-based company, they are domiciled in Maryland, which allows the company to classify its board without shareholder approval .

top_negative.title: The 10 private colleges with the best ROI in the U.S.
top_negative.summary_llm: Princeton University delivers the best ROI among private colleges in the U.S., according to The Princeton Review's latest rankings . The publication considered financial aid, academic rigor and admissions selectivity to determine the colleges that deliver the best value .

top_negative.title: Core inflation rose to 2.9% in July, highest since February
top_negative.summary_llm: Core inflation rose to 2.9% in July, highest since February . That was up 0.1 percentage point from the June level, but in line with the Dow Jones consensus forecast . The Fed uses the PCE price index as its primary forecasting tool . Central bankers target inflation at 2%, so Friday's report shows the economy still a distance from that level .
